original_title: Ears, Eyes and Throats: Restored Classic and Lost Punk Films 1976-1981
overview: This collection of short films represents a hint of the tectonic shift in the underground film world in connection with the punk rock “movement.” Restored from original negatives, it showcases the reasonably well-known alongside the extremely rare, from music shorts to impressionistic documentary.
title: Ears, Eyes and Throats: Restored Classic and Lost Punk Films 1976-1981
